p: Crystallographic data (CIF and structure factors) for the structures reported in this paper has been deposited with the Cambridge Crystallographic Data Centre, no. CCDC-2062904 (for Y 5−xPr xSb 3−yM yLi z) and CCDC-2062905 (for Y 5−xPr xSb 3−yM yNa z). These data can be obtained free of charge from the Cambridge Crystallographic Data Centre via http://www.ccdc.cam.ac.uk/data_request/cif (accessed on 13 February 2021) [ 26].
